page.title: 11CODDINGTON - RECREATION
page.content:
{ }The {population}of Coddington was 1245 in 1983 (Official Census Figure). A survey of adults there showed how they spend their {leisure}time - the most popular activity first:
MALES FEMALES watching T.V./video watching T.V. D.I.Y. reading gardening gardening reading sewing/knitting {Clubs}in the village include football, W.I., Mother And Toddler Group, Youth Club and Bingo. Primary school children living in Coddington attend Beavers, Brownies, Cubs, Scouts, Sunday School and Riding School. The recreation groung is a popular play spot. Leisure activites for Senior Citizens include Senior Citizens Club, coach trips, coffee mornings and Fellowship meetings.
